titleStmt.title: The tryal of Philip Standsfield, son to Sir James Standsfield, of New-Milns; for the murder of his father, and other crimes libel'd against him. / Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Standsfield, Philip, d. 1688, defendant.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: On title, Stuart royal arms of James II as James VII of Scotland.
Reproduction of original in: Marsh's Library, St. Patrick's, Dublin, Ireland.
